description:
encoding/gob: skip TestFuzzRegressions in short mode

Fixes issue 3742.

messages.text: This isn't a good idea. This test is checking specific regressions. These particular regressions should not be allocating large amounts of memory; if they are, we haven't fixed them properly.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

On 2012/07/11 03:09:11, dsymonds wrote:
> This isn't a good idea. This test is checking specific regressions. These
> particular regressions should not be allocating large amounts of memory; if they
> are, we haven't fixed them properly.

Oh. Then this may be a symptom of a larger problem.

subject: code review 6374051: encoding/gob: skip TestFuzzRegressions in short mode
